summary: NAR 03/13/2003  THE CONSUMER WAS TRAVELING WEST BOUND ON OHIO THE TURNPIKE WHEN THE TRACTOR SUDDENLY MADE A HARD LEFT TURN, WHICH ENABLED THE CONSUMER TO THE CONTROL OF THE VEHICLE. THE TRACTOR COLLIDED INTO THE CONCRETE BARRIER ON THE LEFT SIDE OF THE ROAD BECAUSE THE AXLE CAME LOOSE FROM THE SPRINGS.    *CB  *JB
